name: Rapture (itch) (Shadowhunter230)
description:
Rapture is a 2D Pixel shoot em' up styled game, play as a gun wielding mad man shooting his way through scores of monsters as he tries to find his way to the place where it all began.

----------------------------------------------

FEATURES-

  1. Machine gunning
  2. Monster hunting
  3. Unique Monsters
  4. Awesome Music
  5. Amazing scenery

----------------------------------------------

Game Made by Shadow Gaming Studio

Solo Project by Fynix Kapa

----------------------------------------------

Contact Details

 - Fynixk@gmail.com

----------------------------------------------

Find the game also on - https://gamejolt.com/games/Rapture/727738

----------------------------------------------

Controls-

W - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

LMB - Shoot

SpaceBar - Jump
